doc.field: Wang Laboratories said it signed an agreement with Desk Top Financial Solutions Inc> giving Wang the right to market the Desk Top Financial Planning System for Wang's Office Information Systems (OIS) product line. Wang said the Desk Top Financial Planning System for its OIS comes in two basic packages -- the Advanced Planning System, priced at 2,995 dlrs, and the Budget Reporting System, priced at 1,995 dlrs. Both are avialable on eight inch and 5-1/4 inch diskettes, Wang said. Reuter
